p: As interventions in medical treatments, including for epilepsy, have a certain order of priority ( 22), some PWE might be classified as having non-urgent disorders ( 23), despite they might have severe conditions such as COVID-19-related status epilepticus ( 24). However, using advanced technologies such as telemetry ( 10, 25), home-video recordings ( 26) and tele-neuropsychology tests ( 27) should be implemented to maximize efficient provision of appropriate medical interventions.
